id.comment: select read with Modifies where modifier is read synonym and modified is variable

query.querystr: read re; Select re such that Modifies(re, "x")

id.comment: select variable synonym with Modifies where modifier is line# and modified is variable synonym

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1, v)

id.comment: select variable synonym with Modifies where modifier is statement synonym and modified is variable synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(s, v)

id.comment: select statement with Modifies where modifier is assign synonym and modified is variable synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(a, v)

id.comment: select statement with Modifies where modifier is read synonym and modified is variable synonym

query.querystr: stmt s; read re; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(re, v)

id.comment: select statement with Modifies where modifier is line# and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(1, _)

id.comment: select statement with Modifies where modifier is stmt synonym and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(s, _)

id.comment: select statement with Modifies where modifier is assign synonym and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; Select s such that Modifies(a, _)

id.comment: select read with Modifies where modifier is read synonym and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: stmt s; read re; Select s such that Modifies(re, _)

id.comment: select assign with Modifies where modifier is assign synonym and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, _)

id.comment: select read with Modifies where modifier is read synonym and modified is wildcard

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Modifies(r, _)

id.comment: Select statement with pattern with LHS being variable name and RHS being a wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select variable with pattern with LHS being synonym and RHS being a wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Select statement with pattern with LHS being wildcard and RHS being a wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s pattern a (_, _)

id.comment: Select assign with pattern with LHS being variable name and RHS being a string wrapped with wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a pattern a ("x", _"x"_)

id.comment: Select statement with pattern with LHS being synonym and RHS being a string wrapped with wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v pattern a (v, _"3"_)

id.comment: Select statement with pattern with LHS being wildcard and RHS being a string wrapped with wildcard

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s pattern a (_, _"x"_)

id.comment: Select statement with Follows and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 3) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Follows* and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 3) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Parent and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 10) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Parent* and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, 10) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Modifies and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(s,v) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Uses and Pattern (No shared synonyms)

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Uses(s,v) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Follows and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Follows(s, a) pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Select statement with Follows* and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, a) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Parent and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, a) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Parent* and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, a) pattern a ("x", _)

id.comment: Select statement with Modifies and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(s,v) pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Select statement with Uses and Pattern with synonym appearing across relationship and pattern

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Uses(s,v) pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Invalid syntax query - ; at end of query

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s;

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - No such declaration

query.querystr: stmt s; Select v

id.comment: Invalid syntax query - No such relationship

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Hello(s, 1)

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - No such assignment declaration for Pattern

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s pattern a("x", "x")

id.comment: Invalid syntax query - No such design entity

query.querystr: hello s; Select s;

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - Follows/Parent cannot take in variable

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v, v1; Select s such that Parent(v, v1)

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - Uses/Modifies first argument cannot be wildcard

query.querystr: stmt s; variable v; Select s such that Modifies(_, v)

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - Uses/Modifies second argument if synonym has to be variable

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(_, s)

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - Pattern LHS if synonym has to be variable

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; Select s pattern a(s, "x")

id.comment: Invalid semantic query - Pattern expression has invalid grammar

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; Select s pattern a(s, _"+test"_)
